title: Loyola Chicago vs. Illinois - Second Round NCAA tournament extended highlights
author: March Madness
description:
The first one seed fell in the 2021 NCAA Tournament when Loyola Chicago took down Illinois. The Ramblers led from start to finish behind Cameron Krutwig's 19 points. See the extended highlights here.


Watch highlights, game recaps, and much more from the 2021 NCAA Division I Men’s Basketball Tournament on the official NCAA March Madness YouTube channel. Subscribe now to be updated on the latest videos: http://www.youtube.com/marchmadness?sub_confirmation=1
